c3e8a943-6115-45d5-ba54-aa793e4a45a9:
Select one {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}. You cast that spell with greater than normal power.
Benefit: Select one spell. Treat your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} as being two higher for all level-variable effects of the spell.
Every time you gain a level in a spellcasting class, you can choose a new spell to replace the spell selected with this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, and that spell becomes your specialized spell.
